entries.prose_cost: It will cost %DI credits to train in %TO. Would you like to continue?
entries.trainer_unknown: Be mindful of your thoughts. About what are you interested in learning?
entries.greeting: I know why the Force has brought you here. I have forseen your coming. You wish to learn the ways of the Jedi.
entries.no_qualify: You are not yet ready to learn from me. Be mindful of the future, and return to me when you have learned the following skills...
entries.surpass_trainer: Not long ago, you were but the learner. Now you are the master. There is nothing further that I can do for you. May the Force be with you, %TT.
entries.prose_train_failed: You were unable to complete %TO skill training.
entries.nsf_skill_pts: There is a disturbance in the Force. You must first make %DI skill points available before I can train you in %TO.
entries.no_skill_pts: There is a disturbance is the Force. You have no available skill points. I cannot train you at this time.
entries.prose_skill_learned: You successfully train in the %TO skill.
entries.prose_nsf: You lack the %DI credits required for training in %TO.
entries.confirm: Are you sure you wish to purchase this skill?
entries.chosen_path: You have already elected a path. You must seek out a new trainer in order to continue training in your chosen course.
entries.no_teach_jedi: I doubt there is anything I can teach in which you would be interested in learning. I am sorry. Perhaps you should find someone else to train you.
entries.success: You have successfully learned the skill.
entries.topped_out: You require no more training from me. You already know that which I can teach.
entries.error_grant_skill: You cannot learn Jedi-related skills with a character that lacks Force capability.
entries.msg3_2: Yes, quiet your mind and concentrate. The Force will guide you.
entries.msg3_3: Allow me to give you some insight to that skill...
entries.msg3_1: You are not ready to receive any more training at this time.
entries.msg2_4: Patience. You must learn patience. Which of my skills would you like to know about?
entries.msg2_3: Be mindful of your thoughts. In which skills are you interested?
entries.msg2_2: Here are the skills on which you should be practicing. I will teach you these when you have enough experience.
entries.msg2_1: You are ready to train in the following skills...
entries.msg1_1: What skills would you like to know more about?
entries.error_empty_category: You are not ready to receive any more training at this time.
entries.msg_yes: Excellent! Clear your mind and concentrate, and we will begin...
entries.msg_no: Yes, it does you well to exercise patience. How else may I be of service?
